page.title: 08A CARLISLE SUBURB <1>
page.content: Belle Vue is the name of the suburb of Carlisle where I live.It is a plea- sant area,bordering onto open country- side.Most of Belle Vue is used for housing and residential purposes but the houses aren't too squashed up.This is because about twenty years ago Belle Vue was mostly fields.Even now, there are lots of parks and open spaces which haven't been built on.There are play areas which are quite safe for young children and the roads aren't very busy.I like living in Belle Vue because nearly everywhere you look there are green open spaces. Even when you are surrounded by houses you can see green grass in the gardens or by going down a road you are soon in the open enjoying a walk in the country.This is one of the advantages of living in Belle Vue.Another is the quietness of the roads.
